name: NBTD Solitaire Lite
description:
If you are familiar with Solitaire (Klondike), you'll love this.

NBTD Solitaire is the classic game of Solitaire. It has been created as a Universal app so that it may run on iPad, iPhone or iPod touch.


Highlights:
- Universal build (iPad, iPhone & iPod touch)
- Game Center achievements
- Retina display support
- Play in portrait or landscape mode
- Draw 1 & Draw 3 modes
- Standard & Vegas score modes
- Drag and Drop Controls
- Double-tap Controls (double-tap cards to place them)
- Undo 
- Auto-complete feature
- Statistics
- Select from several colorful backgrounds
- Beautiful motioned backgrounds
- Does not disrupt music playing through iPod
